description:
Bokeh is a powerful data visualization library that creates fully
interactive plots and integrates well with the data analysis tools you
already know and love: pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, ggplot. Bokeh can
produce stand-alone browser-based plots and much more sophisticated
server-hosted visualizations.

-  Learn to use bokeh to create everything from basic graphs to advanced
   interactive plots, dashboards, and data applications
-  Incorporate bokeh within your Jupyter/IPython notebooks
-  Partner bokeh with other libraries such as matplotlib, seaborn,
   pandas, and ggplot
-  Learn about bokeh server: to serve up even more impressive realtime
   visualizations
-  Explore configurations and settings
-  Recognize and overcome common problems
title: bokeh: Data Visualization in Python
